name: Seminar: Representation of Otherness in Music Teaching and Learning
description: Course examines how Otherness (race/gender/sexuality/class), framed dualistically, is represented in music curricula and pedagogies across formal and informal educational institutions. Engaging with feminist/queer of colour critique, students investigate and develop responses to erasures of Otherness in music teaching/learning discourses, content and contexts. Selected topics: difference, power, multiculturalism, diversity, colonialism. E. Gould.
